mapper.sql: IN_OUT_NO, TENANT_ID, STAFF_ID, PAY_NO, PAY_TYPE, RELATED_TRANS, IN_OUT_CATEGORY, IN_OUT_TYPE, IN_OUT_MANTISSA, IN_OUT_OBJECT, IN_OUT_AMOUNT, TRANS_TYPE, remarks, add_time, add_account, modify_time, modify_account, is_usable, status, drawee_id, payee_id, drawee_type, payee_type

distinct
from tenants_finance_records
order by ${orderByClause}

TENANT_ID = #{record.tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

IN_OUT_OBJECT = #{inOutObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update tenants_finance_records set TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STAFF_ID = #{staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PAY_NO = #{payNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_TYPE = #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RELATED_TRANS = #{relatedTrans,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IN_OUT_CATEGORY = #{inOutCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IN_OUT_TYPE = #{inOutType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IN_OUT_MANTISSA = #{inOutMantissa,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IN_OUT_OBJECT = #{inOutObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IN_OUT_AMOUNT = #{inOutAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRANS_TYPE = #{transType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, add_account = #{addAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_account = #{modifyAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_usable = #{isUsable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drawee_id = #{draweeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payee_id = #{payeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, drawee_type = #{draweeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payee_type = #{payeeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where IN_OUT_NO = #{inOutNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT IN_OUT_TYPE "InOutType", IN_OUT_NO "no", FUNC_GET_CODE_NAME("BUSS_TYPE",PAY_TYPE,"1") "category", DATE_FORMAT(add_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') "time", IN_OUT_AMOUNT "amount", IN_OUT_OBJECT "object", IN_OUT_MANTISSA "mantissa", remarks "remarks", status "status", drawee_type "draweeType", CASE when PAY_TYPE in('01','02','03','06','10','11') then RELATED_TRANS else "" end as "relatedTrans" FROM tenants_finance_records where TENANT_ID =#{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
ORDER BY add_time DESC limit #{pageNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into tenants_finance_records
IN_OUT_NO,
TENANT_ID,
STAFF_ID,
PAY_NO,
PAY_TYPE,
RELATED_TRANS,
IN_OUT_CATEGORY,
IN_OUT_TYPE,
IN_OUT_MANTISSA,
IN_OUT_OBJECT,
IN_OUT_AMOUNT,
TRANS_TYPE,
remarks,
add_time,
add_account,
modify_time,
modify_account,
is_usable,
status,
drawee_id,
payee_id,
drawee_type,
payee_type,
finance_time,
#{inOutNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{payNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{relatedTrans,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{inOutCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{inOutType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{inOutMantissa,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{inOutObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{inOutAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{transType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{addAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{modifyAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isUsable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{draweeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{payeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{draweeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{payeeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{financeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.select: select ,FUNC_GET_CODE_NAME("BUSS_TYPE",PAY_TYPE,"1") "type",finance_time from tenants_finance_records where TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and finance_time != '' and STAFF_ID =#{staffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by add_time desc
